name: Fate
description: "The Fate Token is a revolutionary token specifically designed to offer a one of a kind reward structure. 50% of all rewards paid out to holders are equally distributed to all holders. This provides incentive to hold for a larger number of total holders. It helps everyone boost their bags even for smaller holders. The Fate Token is also the community token for the FAT EcoSystem and the primary form of currency on Frosting Social. Users of Frosting Social will be able to tip, subscribe and make purchases using the Fate Token."
